name: Jarl
description: As the leader of the Valhallians, the Jarl is a natural-born leader and a skilled strategist, with a deep understanding of the ways of dragons and the dangers they pose to his people. Despite his tough exterior, the Jarl is known for his compassion and empathy, and will do whatever it takes to protect his village and the people he cares about. He is a respected and revered figure among the dragon hunters, and his unwavering commitment to their cause has earned him the loyalty and admiration of his followers.

name: Town Idiot
description: A pitiful figure, often seen stumbling and slurring his words through the streets of Valhalla. His hair is greasy and unkempt, and his clothes are ragged and torn, as if he has been sleeping in them for days. The smell of alcohol clings to him like a second skin, and his breath reeks of cheap ale and stale tobacco.

name: Village Guard
description: A guard clad in steel armor and carrying a spear.

name: Watchman
description: A guardian wearing leather and seemingly constantly scanning the horizon.

name: Blue Bunny
description: A rabbit with gray-blue fur and a red collar with a bell.

name: Undead Farmer
description: A menacing, pesticide-ridden rotting guy, haunting the fields of the Hidden Valley long after his death.

name: Barnyard Bucko
description: Some weird guy you should probably destroy.

name: LurkDragon
description: A big scary dragon!

name: Sentient Sandstorm
description: A cloud of dust and sand trying to suffocate you.

name: Giant Sandworm
description: A foul worm full of teeth with a ravenous hunger that dwells deep beneath the arid dunes of the desert.

name: Mudcrab
description: Giant crabs with claws that could lop off an arm.

name: Megalodon
description: This is one massive shark...

name: Rabid Wolf
description: A gray wolf frothing at the mouth, poor thing!

name: Rattlesnake
description: A relatively large and loud rattlesnake.

name: Winter Wolf
description: A large wolf-like monster with a thick, long white fur coat and sharp claws and teeth.

name: Black Marsh Dragon
description: A gray wolf frothing at the mouth, poor thing!

name: Cinder Drake
description: A monstrous dragon that inhabits the scorching deserts of the world. Its body is covered in red scales that smolder with heat. These scales are said to be as hot as the sand around it, and can melt steel with ease.

name: Pit Horror
description: A colossal, twisted nightmare-inducing beast made of the flesh of its previous victims.

name: Dunes Wraith
description: An extremely powerful ghost-like creature that is capable of possessing humans and other creatures, manipulating their minds and bodies to do its bidding. It is thought that the Dunes Wraith is able to drain the life-force from its victims and to feed on their life energy, leaving nothing but dry, empty husks behind.

name: Abyss Dragon
description: A gigantic dragon that inhabits the deep, dark depths of the world, and is said to be as old as time itself. It is said to be capable of harnessing the power of the shadows and the darkness to bend reality to its will. It is thought that the Abyss Dragon's presence alone can cause madness and insanity.

name: Grendel Spider
description: A massive spider that haunts the dark, tangled caverns beneath the earth. It is a giant, hairy beast that can reach sizes as large as a horse. It hunts underground, stalking its prey in the darkness and striking without warning. Its bite is laced with lethal venom and its silk is stronger than steel.

name: River Demon
description: A terrifying, monstrous entity that lurks in the depths of rivers and ponds, waiting to strike its prey. It is said that those who encounter the River Demon are quickly sucked under the water to meet a terrible fate. The demon is a cunning and devious creature that uses its natural camouflage to its advantage, waiting until its prey is within its grasp before striking.
